org.rapla.rest.gwtjsonrpc.client

Class RemoteJsonException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.rapla.rest.gwtjsonrpc.client.RemoteJsonException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RemoteJsonException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Exception given to AsyncCallback.onFailure(Throwable).

    This exception is used if the remote JSON server has returned a well-formed JSON error response.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteJsonException(java.lang.String message)
      Creates a new RemoteJsonException with code 999 and no data.
      RemoteJsonException(java.lang.String message, int code, com.google.gwt.json.client.JSONValue data)
      Construct a new exception representing a well formed JSON error response.

      Gets the extra error information supplied by the service.

      Same as getData.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteJsonException

        public RemoteJsonException(java.lang.String message,
                   int code,
                   com.google.gwt.json.client.JSONValue data)
        Construct a new exception representing a well formed JSON error response.
        Parameters:
        message - A String value that provides a short description of the error
        code - A number that indicates the actual error that occurred
        data - A JSON value instance that carries custom and application-specific error information

      • RemoteJsonException

        public RemoteJsonException(java.lang.String message)
        Creates a new RemoteJsonException with code 999 and no data.
        Parameters:
        message - A String value that provides a short description of the error

    • Method Detail

      • getCode

        public int getCode()
        Gets the error code.

        Note that the JSON-RPC 1.1 draf does not define error codes yet.

        Returns:
        A number that indicates the actual error that occurred.

      • getError

        public com.google.gwt.json.client.JSONValue getError()
        Same as getData.
        Returns:
        the error data, or null if none was specified
        See Also:
        getData()

      • getData

        public com.google.gwt.json.client.JSONValue getData()
        Gets the extra error information supplied by the service.
        Returns:
        the error data, or null if none was specified
